statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT full_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY full_name ASC
SELECT full_name, gender, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas') ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, location, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, category FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_date, product_name, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, product_name FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, email, customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, gender, email, age, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, gender, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity, amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, behavior_type, behavior_date, behavior_details FROM customers JOIN customer_behavior ON customers.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id WHERE behavior_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY behavior_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, amount, behavior_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN customer_behavior ON customers.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id WHERE amount > 500 AND behavior_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, city, state FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY city;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY age;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, city, state FROM demographics WHERE education_level = 'Graduate';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number, address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.purchase_date, p.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.age, d.gender, d.income, d.education_level FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.age >= 30 AND d.income > 50000;
